## Validation Checklist
Before submitting, verify:
- [ ] Code compiles without errors (`npx tsc --noEmit`)
- [ ] ESLint passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] No console.log statements left
